review_title: Typical Pros and Cons of a Small Agency
job_title: Biddable Media Executive in London, England
pros: Opportunity to learn a number of skills.
cons: As it's a small agency, there isn't always a team/dedicated member for a certain skillset. So team members end up 'wearing a lot of hats' which may go beyond their role as there isn't the resource otherwise. It's good if you're new to the industry, but isn't the best place to specialise.
